body:
### Describe the bug

```
[1/1] Cythonizing arb/issue.pyx
    ext_modules=cythonize(
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1127, in cythonize
    cythonize_one(*args)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Build/Dependencies.py", line 1233, in cythonize_one
    result = compile_single(pyx_file, options, full_module_name=full_module_name)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 727, in compile_single
    return run_pipeline(source, options, full_module_name)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Main.py", line 515, in run_pipeline
    err, enddata = Pipeline.run_pipeline(pipeline, source)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 355, in run_pipeline
    data = run(phase, data)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 335, in run
    return phase(data)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Pipeline.py", line 52, in generate_pyx_code_stage
    module_node.process_implementation(options, result)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 143, in process_implementation
    self.generate_c_code(env, options, result)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ModuleNode.py", line 385, in generate_c_code
    self.body.generate_function_definitions(env, code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 442, in generate_function_definitions
    stat.generate_function_definitions(env, code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 3182, in generate_function_definitions
    FuncDefNode.generate_function_definitions(self, env, code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 1986, in generate_function_definitions
    self.generate_function_body(env, code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 1748, in generate_function_body
    self.body.generate_execution_code(code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 448, in generate_execution_code
    stat.generate_execution_code(code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/UtilNodes.py", line 326, in generate_execution_code
    self.body.generate_execution_code(code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/UtilNodes.py", line 326, in generate_execution_code
    self.body.generate_execution_code(code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 5641, in generate_execution_code
    stat.generate_rhs_evaluation_code(code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/Nodes.py", line 5484, in generate_rhs_evaluation_code
    self.rhs.generate_evaluation_code(code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 767, in generate_evaluation_code
    self.generate_subexpr_evaluation_code(code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 782, in generate_subexpr_evaluation_code
    node.generate_evaluation_code(code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 773, in generate_evaluation_code
    self.generate_result_code(code)
  File "~/lib/python3.10/site-packages/Cython/Compiler/ExprNodes.py", line 13338, in generate_result_code
    code.putln(self.type.from_py_call_code(
AttributeError: 'ErrorType' object has no attribute 'from_py_call_code'
```

### Code to reproduce the behaviour:

```cython
def a(p):
    b = c, d = p.b, p.c
```


### Expected behaviour

Valid python is valid cython

### Environment

OS: macOS
Python version 3.10.9
Cython version 0.29.32


### Additional context

The workaround is to break the assignment into multiple lines:

```cython
def a(p):
    c, d = p.b, p.c
    b = c, d
```

I generally diagnose these kinds of issues by commenting out parts of the code until it builds.

comment_data.body: This looks to have been fixed in master in d53646f193bf8be44495c3294d8c76c986b7921e. It's reasonably straightforward so might be a candidate to backport

title: [BUG] AttributeError: 'ErrorType' object has no attribute 'from_py_call_code'
